CustomField.description: This pertains to the frequency of transfer permitted under the Letter of Credit. The Letter of Credit may have the following options: 0) Not transferable; 1) Transferable only once and only in its entirety to a transferee of the Note (Single Transfer) ; and 2) Transfer may be more than once but only in its entirety to a transferee of the Note (Multiple transfer).
CustomField.inlineHelpText: This pertains to the frequency of transfer permitted under the Letter of Credit.
CustomField.label: Credit Transfer Type for LC
